DataElement.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men 4 Past 6 Months How Difficult to Maintain Erection to Complete Sexual Intercourse Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how difficult it was to maintain their erection to completion of sexual intercourse, using a 6 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men Past 6 Months How Difficult to Maintain Erection to Complete Sexual Intercourse Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present._A question about how difficult it is or was for an individual to maintain their erection to completion of intercourse._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research.

Concepts.definition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research.

Property.preferredName: Past 6 Months How Difficult to Maintain Erection to Complete Sexual Intercourse Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.:A question about how difficult it is or was for an individual to maintain their erection to completion of intercourse.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Difficult to Maintain Erection to Complete Sexual Intercourse
Concepts.definition: A question about how difficult it is or was for an individual to maintain their erection to completion of intercourse.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that sexual intercourse was not attempted.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that sexual intercourse was not attempted.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual finds something to be extremely difficult.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual finds something to be extremely difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was very difficult.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was very difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was difficult.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was slightly difficult.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was slightly difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was not difficult.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was not difficult.
